summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the West Seattle Freeway; authorizing continuation of emergency measures in connection with W. Seattle Freeway, North Bridge, Reconstruciton Project; making an appropriation and transfer from the West Seattle Freeway Fund for reimbursement of prior appropriations in connection with emergency measures taken for said Reconstruction Project and for increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department for continuation of such activities and payment for towing services.
